duties_responsibilities.duty: National travel on short notice, supporting increased volume and commission pay.
Local pick-up and delivery of vehicles to designated Copart facility.
Loading and unloading vehicles safely and free of damage.
Deploying to catastrophe events within 24 hours when directed to do so.
Maintaining and assuring good operating condition of all equipment and facilities.
Other tasks as assigned by the manager in support of daily auctions.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 1-year towing and/or load securement experience in the last 5 years.
